programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi and Jarrod compete to see who can turn a bigger profit; Jarrod reveals his alter ego; Brandi and Jarrod discover that friendship is magic; Brandi attends an auction; Brandi and Jarrod say goodbye to a special location.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Barry's Best Buys
programme.desc: A collection of Barry Weiss' most memorable strategies for landing a storage locker, from the wildly successful to the utterly ridiculous.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Biggest Scores
programme.desc: In El Monte, Calif., Mary steps up with her new boyfriend to get the most expensive locker of the day; Darrell bets big on treasure or trash; the bidders discover vintage treasure; Barry goes whole hog on a locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Puffy in the Sky With Diamonds
programme.desc: In Irving, Texas, one of the buyers stands to uncover a diamond in the rough.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders travel to Tyler, Texas; Ricky is concerned by Victor's influence over Bubba; Jenny unearths a rare insect display; Moe needs Mary's help.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: For the Benefit of Mr. Charles
programme.desc: Rangers Ricky and Bubba attempt to both go big and go home; Matt Blevins resorts to scare tactics; and Mary shows up with an old friend who keeps people guessing.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The auction season concludes with a bang in Fort Worth, Texas; Moe the junk-hoarding foot doctor, now limited to one locker a year by his wife, returns for his annual purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: A stranger on a motorcycle drives up prices in the city of DeSoto, where only four lockers are up for grabs; Ricky and Bubba hope to sweep the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Mary hopes to beat the competition when the buyers visit the city of Plano; Ricky scores a little doll; Kenny finds a locker of mixed martial arts equipment.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Jenny and Victor bid on a locker filled with trinkets; Bubba journeys to the heart of storage darkness; Mary tries to prevent Moe from buying a locker filled with barbecue sauce; Victor brings a truck to beat the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders look for big deals in the small town of Ponder; Jenny acts like a ballerina while Mary works the crowd; Ricky and Bubba are provoked by Matt Blevins.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders return to the Dallas suburb of Carrollton; Ricky and Bubba uncover a den of deviance; a confident Kenny returns to action; Mary brings a roaring crowd to its feet.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Buyers head to Fort Worth in search of Western collectibles and heirlooms; Ricky and Bubba bring a legendary cowboy for help; Victor tries to make peace with the locals; Lesa Lewis finds the ultimate weapon.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: In Burleson, Texas, Moe hunts for oddities while Lesa and Victor battle over a pricey store display.

programme.desc: The bidders hunt for treasure in the Dallas suburb of Addison; Jenny discovers a piece of Hollywood; Mary makes a fateful purchase; two buyers haggle over an item.

programme.desc: The buyers travel to the upscale area of Las Colinas; Moe has a good kind of bomb scare; Jenny explores the world of high-priced sports cars.
